name: Arthur Zleip
story: Arthur is a young man who has lived in his small Greek village all his life. He is married to his childhood sweetheart and they are expecting their first child. Arthur works as a clerk in the village council and is known for being very formal and reserved in his mannerisms. He takes his duties seriously and is well-respected in the community. Despite not being particularly outgoing, Arthur enjoys playing traditional Greek music on his bouzouki in his spare time.
